ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... So you re level 10, untwinked, and wearing BANDED???  What am I doing wrong?  Good job helping that other bard out.  He must have been twinked to get
ygData.messageBody:
Adagia wrote:
> obvious he was twinked. Here was this level 10 wood elf bard, dressed
> head to toe in bronze. I gave him the gauntlets, and he very
> graciously
> gave me his old bronze gauntlets. :) They look nice on Adagia, but I
> think they are too heavy, I'll probably just stick to banded for now.

So you're level 10, untwinked, and wearing BANDED??? What am I doing wrong?
<sigh>

Good job helping that other bard out. He must have been twinked to get to
level 10 playing only one song. Weaving's all that's kept me alive many
times over.

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
